title: The Best Christmas Tree Ornaments From Catalogs—as Chosen by Design Pros
sub_head: We asked picky interior designers to look at mass-market retailers’ offerings—and select affordable holiday decorations they’d hang on their own trees
body:
FOR THIS season of low-key celebration, we asked sophisticated design pros to examine the holiday websites of mass-market retailers and find ornaments special enough to hang in their own homes. The exercise “slightly intimidated” Heide Hendricks, a designer in Sharon, Conn., who typically prefers bespoke and handmade baubles. After scouring the fairly inexpensive offerings at Joss & Main, she found one that “surprised and delighted” her. Here, our experts share their discoveries.
